Package ICS4UProject

Interface Body

All Superinterfaces:
Kinetic, KineticsWithSize
All Known Implementing Classes:
BodyImage, BodyRec, CollisionBodyImage, CollisionBodyRec, Enemy, EnemyShell, InteractiveObjectImage, InteractiveObjectRec, Lavaball, Mushroom, Player
public interface Body extends KineticsWithSize
This body interface represents a game object with dimension and basic forces
